977060.name: Tombeaux - Soundtrack
977060.description:
This is the original soundtrack for Tombeaux, composed by Joselyn Fear. The soundtrack is included with all purchases and downloads of Tombeaux.

Track Listing, appearing in chronological order of gameplay:
1. Tombeaux Theme
2. Wild River
3. Cabin 1
4. Gichi-Ziibi (Big River)
5. Cabin 2
6. Fashionable River
7. Cabin 3
8. River of Pine
9. Cabin 4
10. River of Recreation (Country)
11. River of Recreation (Hip Hop)
12. River of Recreation (Rock)
13. Cabin 5
14. Riviere Tombeaux
977060.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
